content:
I don't have a personal preference for dishes. however, i can suggest some other popular vietnamese dishes that you can try:

1. banh mi: french-influenced vietnamese baguette sandwich filled with meat, vegetables, and herbs.

2. bun cha: grilled pork served over rice noodles with fresh herbs, pickled vegetables, and a dipping sauce.

3. ca kho to: fish simmered in a claypot with caramelized sauce, served with steamed rice.

4. com ga: chicken marinated in fish sauce and spices, served with jasmine rice and fresh herbs.

5. bun rieu: crab and tomato soup served with rice noodles and various herbs and vegetables.

6. banh xeo: vietnamese rice flour pancake filled with pork, shrimp, and bean sprouts, served with a dipping sauce.

these are just a few popular vietnamese dishes to try. vietnamese cuisine is so diverse and has so much to offer, so don't be afraid to explore and discover new dishes.
